message: All metadata fields for the indicator 12-a-1, translated into en
data: Objective 12. Establish sustainable consumption and production patterns12.a Help developing countries acquire the scientific and technological means that will enable them to move towards more sustainable consumption and production patterns12.a.1 Amount of assistance provided to developing countries for research and development activities on sustainable consumption and production patterns and environmentally sound technologiescategory IIIDetermination of the amount of assistance provided to developing countries for research and development activities devoted to sustainable consumption and production patterns and environmentally sound technologiesNot availableThe indicator can be compared to other indicators of the same type at regional and international level
